00036 #ifndef PACKET_H
00037 #define PACKET_H
00038 
00039 /* does not include 2 byte FCS checksum */
00040 #ifndef MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE
00041 #define MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE 125
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #define PACKET_STATS 0
00045 
00046 struct packet {
00047         uint8_t length; /* does not include FCS checksum */
00048         volatile struct packet * left;
00049         volatile struct packet * right;
00050         /* offset into data for first byte of the packet payload */
00051         /* On TX this should be 0 */
00052         /* On RX this should be 1 since the maca puts the length as the first byte*/
00053         uint8_t offset;         
00054         uint8_t lqi;
00055         uint8_t status;
00056         uint32_t rx_time;
00057         #if PACKET_STATS
00058         uint8_t seen; 
00059         uint8_t post_tx;
00060         uint8_t get_free;
00061         uint8_t rxd;
00062         #endif
00063         uint8_t data[MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE+2+1]; /* +2 for FCS; + 1 since maca returns the length as the first byte */
00064 };
00065 typedef struct packet packet_t;
00066 
00067 #endif
